definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
medium/intermediary/matchmaker/go-between/abbr. for 媒體|媒体[mei2 ti3], media, esp. news media

sentences.english: names, adding value to the existing hypermedia network.
sentences.chinese: 名稱，增加現有超媒體網絡的價值。
對電視迷來說，這是一部超媒體之作。

sentences.english: In this paper, a supermedia user interface is developed to overcome this problem.
sentences.chinese: 利用超媒體人機交互接口可以解決這個問題。
